name: Garlic & Herb Whipped Cottage Cheese Dip
description: Delicious high protein cottage cheese dip made with garlic & fresh herbs. Serve this whipped cottage cheese dip with veggies, cracks & more!
instructions: Add cottage cheese, basil, thyme, garlic, lemon juice, and black pepper to a high-powered blender. Blend on high for 30 seconds to 1 minute, use a blender tamper or a spatula to scrape down the sides and get things moving as necessary, and blend again until silky smooth. Serve as a dip with fresh cut vegetables or pita chips, on a sandwich, or spread on a toast with sliced heirloom tomato, olive oil, salt, pepper, and basil. This would also make an amazing pasta sauce!
